<h3 align="center">基于Electron的鼠标连点器

<h4 align="center">
  <a href="https://github.com/ding-jc/mouse-cc/releases">🍕下载</a>
</h4>

# 🍭鼠标连点器

### 🧱[Electrn](https://www.electronjs.org/)+[Vue](https://cn.vuejs.org/)+[ArcoDesign](https://arco.design/)

### Install

```bash
npm install
```

### Development

```bash
npm run dev
```

### Build

```bash
# For windows
npm run build:win
```
